analyzed: bla mas mtshhon pa'i sku gsum ni/_/legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin/_/

analyzed: e gsang chos kyi 'byung gnas su/_/wam skyed sbyor bas 'byung bzhi grub/_/rkang

translated: The fire in the groin, the water in the navel, the earth in the chest, the wind in the joints, and the great lord of the elements in the🔽.🔽mandala of the earth🔽.

original: lnga'i rtshig_/'dod yon dbang po lnga'i mdzes/_/lce ni rin chen pha gu sna/_/
analyzed: lnga'i rtshig_/'dod yon dbang po lnga'i mdzes/_/lce ni rin chen pha gu sna/_/
translated: accomplish the supreme secret joy. The five winds are the essence of the five precious things. The objects of desire are the beauty of the five sense organs. The tongue is the jeweled fence. The🔽.🔽nose is the jeweled banner. The eyes are the precious sun and moon. The ears are the precious conch. The body is the precious🔽.

original: rtsha rnams dra ba phyed pa ste/_/bye brag so so'i phreng bas brgyan/_/mi mnyam me
analyzed: rtsha rnams dra ba phyed pa ste/_/bye brag so so'i phreng bas brgyan/_/mi mnyam me

analyzed: dang gru bzhi ste/_/dran dang dbang po sgo bzhir lha/_/rnam shes tshhogs brgyad
translated: fire, and square. The doors of the four faculties of mindfulness are the deities. The eight assemblies of consciousness

original: dur khrod brgyad/_/gnas kyi dbye ba rab bstan pas/_/mdor bsdus nas ni
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad/_/gnas kyi dbye ba rab bstan pas/_/mdor bsdus nas ni
translated: are the eight charnel grounds. The divisions of the places are fully explained.🔽In brief,

analyzed: bla ma gsang bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The Secret Practice of the Gurus🔽is to be explained. In the assembly, Pulliramalaya, the crown of the head, Jālandhara,

analyzed: g.yon/_/ra mi shwa ra smin ma'i dbus/_/mig gnyis d+he wi ko ti dang /_/ma la wa ni dpung ba'i rtsha/_/ka ma ru ni mchan khung gnyis/_/ar bu ta ni nu ma
translated: the left ear, Rāmeśvara, between the eyebrows, the two eyes, Devīkoṭa,🔽the two nostrils, Kāmarūpa, the two shoulders,🔽the two nipples, Arbuda, the two breasts,

analyzed: gnyis/_/ko sa la ni lte bar shes/_/tri sha ku ni sna'i rtshe/_/kha'i pad+ma ka ling
translated: Kośala is known to be the navel, Triśakuni is the tip of the nose, the lotus of the mouth is Kaliṅga,🔽the two lips are Oḍra, and the two jaws are Aṭṭa.

original: ka_/mgrin pa lam pa kar ni brjod/_/snying ni kan tshir shes par bya/_/hi ma🔽la ni gsum mdor shes/_/mtshhan ma sgri ha pre ta dang /_/pre ta pu ri gshang
analyzed: ka_/mgrin pa lam pa kar ni brjod/_/snying ni kan tshir shes par bya/_/hi ma la ni gsum mdor shes/_/mtshhan ma sgri ha pre ta dang /_/pre ta pu ri gshang
translated: The groin is known as Himālaya,🔽and the anus is called Śrī Preta and Pretapuri.

original: ba'i lam/_/brla gnyis wan+na di ba te/_/so tra ni byin pa gnyis/_/rkang pa'i
analyzed: ba'i lam/_/brla gnyis wan+na di ba te/_/so tra ni byin pa gnyis/_/rkang pa'i
translated: The two thighs are Vanā and Divā,🔽the two testicles are Sotā,🔽and the two feet are Sindhu and Puṇḍra.

original: bol ni sin d+hu'i dpun/_/sor mo rnams la na ga ra/_/the bong gnyis ni ma
analyzed: bol ni sin d+hu'i dpun/_/sor mo rnams la na ga ra/_/the bong gnyis ni ma
translated: The toes are Nāgāra,🔽and the two thumbs are known as Madhū.🔽Kuluta is the heel of the foot.

original: d+hur shes/_/ku lu ta ni rkang pa'i 'thil/_/de ltar gnas kyis rnam pa dag_/
analyzed: d+hur shes/_/ku lu ta ni rkang pa'i 'thil/_/de ltar gnas kyis rnam pa dag_/
translated: In that way, the pure aspects of the locations🔽are the ten stages. The channels are the nature of the heroines,

original: sa bcu par ni dag pa nyid/_/rtsha rnams dpa' mo'i rang bzhin te/_/bde ba🔽dpa' bo'i rnam par rgyu/_/rtshib ma rdo rje'i rwa sogs bsrung /_/ba spu mtshhon

translated: and the bliss🔽moves in the aspect of the heroes. The ribs are protected by the vajra spikes,🔽and the body hairs become the net of the signs.🔽The nails are protected by the blazing mountain of fire.

original: cha'i dra bar gyur/_/sen mo me ri 'bar bas bsrung /_/sku'i dkyil 'khor
analyzed: cha'i dra bar gyur/_/sen mo me ri 'bar bas bsrung /_/sku'i dkyil 'khor
translated: The maṇḍala of the body🔽is well established.🔽The bindu, which is the nature of the moon,

analyzed: legs par grub/_/thig le zla ba'i rang bzhin las/_/rnam shes a thung
translated: is the consciousness.

original: gzugs dang 'grogs/_/rmi nyi ma'i rang bzhin las/_/zhu bde spros dang bral
analyzed: gzugs dang 'grogs/_/rmi nyi ma'i rang bzhin las/_/zhu bde spros dang bral
translated: which melts into the bliss of the melting🔽and becomes free from elaborations.🔽At that time, the protector Vajra Body arises,

original: bar gyur/_/de tshhe rigs kyi phyag mtshhan mdzes/_/mgon po sku'i rdo rje bzhengs/_/
analyzed: bar gyur/_/de tshhe rigs kyi phyag mtshhan mdzes/_/mgon po sku'i rdo rje bzhengs/_/
translated: adorned with the insignia of the family.🔽The body of the vajra master is the sequential🔽abiding of the Victor’s body.🔽First, Vajra Body🔽truly abides in the form aggregate.

original: rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni rims bzhin bzhugs/_/dang po sku'i rdo rje ni/_/gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhugs/_/rjes su chags

analyzed: pa'i rdo rje ni/_/tshhor ba yi ni phung por bzhugs/_/bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje

analyzed: ni/_/'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/mched pa kun gyi rdo rje ni/_/
translated: Vajra Increase🔽abides in the aggregate of formation.

original: 'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/bcom ldan thugs kyis rdo rje ni/_/rnam
analyzed: 'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/bcom ldan thugs kyis rdo rje ni/_/rnam
translated: The Bhagavat Vajra Mind🔽truly abides in the aggregate of consciousness.

original: shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/_/'di'i sha sogs sa khams la/_/bcom
analyzed: shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/_/'di'i sha sogs sa khams la/_/bcom
translated: In the earth element of the flesh, and so on,🔽the Bhagavat is the great mother, Lochana.

original: ldan yum chen spyan ma bzhugs/_/dro ba la sogs me khams la/_/bcom ldan
analyzed: ldan yum chen spyan ma bzhugs/_/dro ba la sogs me khams la/_/bcom ldan
translated: In the fire element of heat, and so on,🔽the Bhagavat is Mamaki.

original: yum chen gos dkar mo/_/skyod pa la sogs rlung khams la/_/bcom ldan yum
analyzed: yum chen gos dkar mo/_/skyod pa la sogs rlung khams la/_/bcom ldan yum
translated: The great mother Pāṇḍaravāsinī🔽resides in the wind element of movement and so forth.🔽The great mother of the conquerors Tārā🔽resides in the water element of moisture and so forth.

original: chen sgrol ma bzhugs/_/gsher ba la sogs chu khams la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje
analyzed: chen sgrol ma bzhugs/_/gsher ba la sogs chu khams la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje
translated: The great mother of the conquerors Māmakī🔽resides in the earth element of solidity and so forth.🔽The great mother of the conquerors Vajradhātvīśvarī

analyzed: ma ma ki/_/de bzhin sku'i khams rnams la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje dbyings phyug ma//

original: yul lnga rnam par dag pa las/_/mchod pa'i lha mo lnga ru gyur/_/de'i mig gi
analyzed: yul lnga rnam par dag pa las/_/mchod pa'i lha mo lnga ru gyur/_/de'i mig gi
translated: The two eye sense organs🔽are the tathāgata Kṣitigarbha.🔽The two ear sense organs🔽are the tathāgata Vajrapāṇi.🔽The one who resides in the nose

original: dbang po gnyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i snying /_/de'i rna ba'i dbang
analyzed: dbang po gnyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i snying /_/de'i rna ba'i dbang

original: gnyis la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rdor bzhugs/_/de'i sna la bzhugs pa
analyzed: gnyis la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rdor bzhugs/_/de'i sna la bzhugs pa
translated: The one who resides in the tongue🔽is the tathāgata Lokeśvara.🔽The one who resides in the body🔽is the tathāgata Samantabhadra.

original: ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam snying po/_/de'i lce la bzhugs pa ni/_/de
analyzed: ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam snying po/_/de'i lce la bzhugs pa ni/_/de
translated: The one who resides in the mind🔽is the tathāgata Vairocana.🔽The one who resides in the four elements🔽is the tathāgata Amoghasiddhi.

original: bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang /_/khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/_/
analyzed: bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang /_/khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/_/
translated: The one who resides in the aggregate of form🔽is the tathāgata Akṣobhya.🔽The one who resides in the aggregate of feeling🔽is the tathāgata Ratnasaṃbhava.

analyzed: 'du shes bya bar rtags pa la/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i/_/de
translated: The one who resides in the aggregate of discrimination🔽is the tathāgata Amitābha.🔽The one who resides in the aggregate of compositional factors🔽is the tathāgata Vajrasattva.🔽The one who resides in the aggregate of consciousness🔽is the tathāgata Vairocana.

original: bzhin gshegs pa de na bzhugs/_/de yi yid kyi dbang po la/_/de bzhin🔽gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs/_/lus kyi tshhigs rnams thams cad la/_/

translated: The Tathagata Manjushri is present in the mind.🔽The Tathagata Samantabhadra is present in all the joints of the body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang /_/lus kyi rtsha rgyus thams cad la/_/de🔽bzhin gshegs pa byams pa bzhugs/_/lag pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/

translated: The Tathagata Maitreya is present in all the veins of the body.🔽The Tathagata Yamari is present in the right hand.🔽The Tathagata Aparajita is present in the left hand.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed/_/lag pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/🔽de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub/_/kha'i pad+mar bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin🔽gshegs pa rta mgrin no/_/gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed/_/lag pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub/_/kha'i pad+mar bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no/_/gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
translated: The Tathagata Hayagriva is present in the lotus of the mouth.🔽The Tathagata Takkiraja is present in the secret place.🔽The Tathagata Achala is present in the right shoulder.

original: gshegs pa bdud rtshi 'khyil/_/dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin🔽gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/_/dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
analyzed: gshegs pa bdud rtshi 'khyil/_/dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/_/dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
translated: The Tathagata Kshitigarbha is present in the left shoulder.🔽The Tathagata Niladanda is present in the right knee.🔽The Tathagata Padmanarteshvara is present in the left knee.🔽The Tathagata Amritakundali is present in the right ankle.

original: gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/_/pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
analyzed: gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/_/pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
translated: The Tathagata Trailokyavijaya is present in the left ankle.

original: bla ma gsang bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba/🔽gshegs pa stobs po che/_/rang gi spyi bor bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs
analyzed: bla ma gsang bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ gshegs pa stobs po che/_/rang gi spyi bor bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs
translated: The one called “accomplishing the secret guru”🔽is the one called “the Tathāgata Cakravartin”🔽who resides on the crown of one’s head.🔽The one called “the Tathāgata Sumbha”

original: pa 'khor los sgyur/_/rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa🔽gnod mdzes so/_/lus kun de dag kun la yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa
analyzed: pa 'khor los sgyur/_/rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes so/_/lus kun de dag kun la yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa
translated: resides under the feet.🔽The Tathāgata Vajrasattva🔽resides in all of those in the entire body.

original: thams cad bzhugs/_/sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa/_/rdo rje sems🔽dpa' nyid kyi lus/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs
analyzed: thams cad bzhugs/_/sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi lus/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs
translated: The body maṇḍala is the body of Vajrasattva🔽himself.🔽All buddhas without exception🔽are the body of the buddhahood that is not left as a remainder.

analyzed: rgyas ma lus 'di/_/lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku/_/skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor

analyzed: pa/_/mya ngan 'das la bzhugs par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa myur du thob//
translated: in this life will abide in nirvāṇa.🔽Since you have ripened virtue,

analyzed: khyed kyis dge ba yongs su smin/_/de bas rdo rje slob dpon ni/_/mthong na
translated: when you see the vajra master,🔽the meaning is that you will be

analyzed: don ni yod pa de/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi sems dpa' che/_/des na sems can

analyzed: thams cad kyis/_/lha la mchod pa'i yo byad kyis/_/rab tu 'bad pas bla ma
translated: worship the guru with great effort.🔽Then, the bodhisattvas, the famous ones,

analyzed: mchod/_/de nas mthong ba don yod bcas/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags
translated: and the ones with unfailing sight,🔽having bowed with joy and respect,

analyzed: chen dang /_/dga' zhing gus pas phyag byas na/_/bcom ldan 'das ma mchi
translated: the Bhagavatī is not present.

analyzed: ma blag_/gsung de thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs/_/legs so byas pa byin

analyzed: pa ni/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/_/a a/_i u /_u /
translated: The Bhagavatī says, “Excellent!”🔽A, a, i, u, u,

analyzed: \u0f10/ /_lo /_l-i l-i/_e i/_o sko_/_o o_dang gsal byed rang

analyzed: bzhin te/_/ka tsha ta ta pa'i sde tshhan dang /_/ya ra la wa sha sha sa ha k+sha/_/gsung gi

analyzed: par gyis/_/mar sar gnas par 'gyur ba yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gos

analyzed: dkar sogs/_/sngags kyis rgyal po rab tu gnas/_/klog dang bsam gtan

analyzed: rab tu gnas/_/de ring ngag gi rab tu smin/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bka'

analyzed: stshal pa/_/rang byung gsal ba kun mkhyen pa/_/nga ni mi gnas dbyings su dag/

original: gnyis med bde ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan/_/nga ni lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/gang shar
analyzed: gnyis med bde ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan/_/nga ni lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/gang shar
translated: Whatever arises is my🔽sacred place.🔽I am free from proliferation.

original: ba ni nga yi rtshal/_/nga ni spros dang bral ba'o/_/yul drug snang ba nga yi gdangs//
analyzed: ba ni nga yi rtshal/_/nga ni spros dang bral ba'o/_/yul drug snang ba nga yi gdangs//
translated: The appearance of the six objects is my radiance.🔽Whatever is nondual.

original: gang yang gnyis su med pa'o/_/rgyu 'bras rkyen gyis bdag gi spyan/_/dge ba
analyzed: gang yang gnyis su med pa'o/_/rgyu 'bras rkyen gyis bdag gi spyan/_/dge ba
translated: My eye is the condition of cause and effect.🔽My life is the vajra.🔽My ornament is the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: rdo rje nga yi srog_/nga yi rgyan ni ye shes lnga/_/bde bar gshegs pa kun la
analyzed: rdo rje nga yi srog_/nga yi rgyan ni ye shes lnga/_/bde bar gshegs pa kun la
translated: I am pleasing to all sugatas.🔽Existence and peace are my feet.

original: mdzes/_/srid dang zhi ba nga yi zhabs/_/mi gnas pa ni rdo rje'i thugs/_/
analyzed: mdzes/_/srid dang zhi ba nga yi zhabs/_/mi gnas pa ni rdo rje'i thugs/_/
translated: Nonabiding is the vajra mind.🔽Generation and completion are very clear.

original: skyed dang rdzogs pa shin tu gsal/_/grol ba'i gtsho bo sangs rgyas so/_/nyon
analyzed: skyed dang rdzogs pa shin tu gsal/_/grol ba'i gtsho bo sangs rgyas so/_/nyon
translated: The bindu of liberation is buddhahood.🔽Listen, Mañjuśrīkumārabhūta!

original: mongs lnga dang ye shes lnga/_/dbyer med rdo rje zhes bya ba/_/'chang ba 'dzin pa
analyzed: mongs lnga dang ye shes lnga/_/dbyer med rdo rje zhes bya ba/_/'chang ba 'dzin pa
translated: are inseparable, called the “vajra holder,”🔽the one who holds and upholds.🔽The consciousness is asserted to be Vajradhara.

original: zhes grags yin/_/rnam shes rdo rje 'chang du 'dod/_/khyed kyis dge ba yongs
analyzed: zhes grags yin/_/rnam shes rdo rje 'chang du 'dod/_/khyed kyis dge ba yongs
translated: You have completely ripened virtue,🔽and today you have become a child of the buddhas,

original: su smin/_/bdag don gzhan don 'bras bu bcas/_/de ring sangs rgyas sras
analyzed: su smin/_/bdag don gzhan don 'bras bu bcas/_/de ring sangs rgyas sras
translated: with the result of benefit for self and other.🔽You have obtained the empowerment of the vase

original: su gyur/_/gtsho bo dbang skur rab tu thob/_/nga yi dgongs pa rab tu rtogs/_/
analyzed: su gyur/_/gtsho bo dbang skur rab tu thob/_/nga yi dgongs pa rab tu rtogs/_/
translated: and have realized my intention.🔽You have become a great lord of yogins

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gyur/_/mya ngan 'das la rab tu bzhugs/_/
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gyur/_/mya ngan 'das la rab tu bzhugs/_/
translated: and will remain in nirvana.🔽Vajra of nonabiding, may you prosper.”

original: mi gnas rdo rje khyed la smin/_/de skad ces ni thos pa dang /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa
analyzed: mi gnas rdo rje khyed la smin/_/de skad ces ni thos pa dang /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa
translated: When Vajrapāṇi heard this,🔽he was overjoyed and made offerings to the victors equal to space.

original: rab dga' ba/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i rgyal ba mchod/_/rjes su yi rang gus
analyzed: rab dga' ba/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i rgyal ba mchod/_/rjes su yi rang gus
translated: He rejoiced and made prostrations

original: phyag 'tshhal/_/'khor lo sgyur ba'i gtsho bo yis/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa gsal bar bstan//
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal/_/'khor lo sgyur ba'i gtsho bo yis/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa gsal bar bstan//
translated: and was clearly shown to be Vajrapāṇi by the lord of the cakravartins.🔽I, the compiler, and others heard this

original: sdud 7po la sogs bdag gis thos/_/til+lo pa yis ma brjed bzung /_/'phags pa
analyzed: sdud 7po la sogs bdag gis thos/_/til+lo pa yis ma brjed bzung /_/'phags pa
translated: and were held by Tilopa without forgetting.

original: lha yi mngon par gyis/_/bla ma gsang ba sgrub pa ni/_/pan+ti ta na ga dzu nas mdzad
analyzed: lha yi mngon par gyis/_/bla ma gsang ba sgrub pa ni/_/pan+ti ta na ga dzu nas mdzad
translated: was composed by Paṇḍita Nāgāhvaya.🔽It is complete.🔽At the glorious Dingri Langkor Monastery,

original: pa rdzogs snyo//_// dpal ding ri glang 'khor gyi dgon par/_pan+ti ta bi bu ti tshan+d+ras
analyzed: pa rdzogs snyo//_// dpal ding ri glang 'khor gyi dgon par/_pan+ti ta bi bu ti tshan+d+ras
translated: it was translated by the paṇḍita Vibhūticandra.🔽The lineage of this [practice]: Vajradhara, Vajrapāṇi,🔽Nāgārjuna, Candrakīrti,🔽Nāropa, Phamthingpa,

original: bsgyur ba'o/_/ @ga_/_/ @#/_/'di'i brgyud pa ni/_rdo rje 'chang /_phyag na rdo rje/_na
analyzed: bsgyur ba'o/_/ @ga_/_/ @#/_/'di'i brgyud pa ni/_rdo rje 'chang /_phyag na rdo rje/_na
translated: Śākya Bhadrasa, Vibhūticandra,🔽Rāhula,🔽and Lama Zhang.🔽The Guru-Secret Practice🔽The guru-secret practice

original: bla ma gsang bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: bla ma gsang bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba/
translated: is called The Guru-Secret Practice.🔽It was composed by Paṇḍita Nāgāhvaya.🔽It is complete.🔽At the glorious Dingri Langkor Monastery,🔽it was translated by the paṇḍita Vibhūticandra.🔽The lineage of this [practice]: Vajradhara, Vajrapāṇi,🔽Nāgārjuna, Candrakīrti,

original: ga ma na/_sgrub pa/_na ro pa/_pham mthing pa/_shakya kya b+ha tra/_bi bu ti
analyzed: ga ma na/_sgrub pa/_na ro pa/_pham mthing pa/_shakya kya b+ha tra/_bi bu ti
translated: Nāropa, Phamthingpa, Śākya Bhadrasa, Vibhūticandra,🔽Rāhula,

original: tshan+d+ra/_rab shri b+ha tra/_bla ma zhang /_rat+na sing ha rnams so//_//
analyzed: tshan+d+ra/_rab shri b+ha tra/_bla ma zhang /_rat+na sing ha rnams so//_//
